name: Techvedic
description:
Techvedic offers comprehensive, on-demand, reliable, and affordable technical support service all over the USA. We lead with a team of certified and well experienced IT professionals to assist worldwide customers with tech support solutions along with technology journalism, data backup and recovery services and communication and collaboration solutions.
We specialize in online remote tech support and IT consulting & support, business IT solutions technology training, outsourcing services.
In October 2009, Techvedic began its operation locally in the US in Las Vegas, Nevada and expanded nationally in 2011 - providing consumers with a unified, fully owned task force to help them manage their growing dependence on technology. Techvedic offers end-to-end solutions regarding its deployment and configuration at client's premise. Cloud back is offered under different plans, and this is available for different home and business users.
